: You will need flour, sugar, eggs, butter, baking powder, milk, and vanilla extract.
: Set your oven to 350°F (175°C) to preheat while you prepare the batter.
: Grease and flour your cake pan to prevent sticking.
: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and a pinch of salt. Mix well.
: In a separate bowl, beat the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
: Add eggs one at a time to the butter mixture, mixing well after each addition.
: Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with milk. Mix until just combined.
: Stir in the vanilla extract for flavor.
: Transfer the batter into the prepared cake pan, smoothing the top.

: Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with milk. Mix until just combined.
: Stir in the vanilla extract for flavor.
: Transfer the batter into the prepared cake pan, smoothing the top.
: Place the pan in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
: Once baked, remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for about 10 minutes. Then, transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
: Once the cake is completely cool, you can frost it with your favorite icing and decorate as desired.
